item.title: Zero cost preview environments on Kubernetes with Jenkins X and Osiris
item.description: In february 2019, I wrote a blog post on Medium titled Zero cost preview environments on Kubernetes with Jenkins X and Osiris, explaining how to improve Jenkins X Preview Environments using Osiris, to automatically scale down to 0 the idle environments. You can read the full blog post on Medium.
